Kiyovu Sports vs Police FC

Kiyovu Sports 2-0 Police FC

Uko umukino uri kugenda

Umwanditsi

: Eric Tony Ukurikiyimfura

Amafoto

: Ntare Julius

16:57

Kiyovu Sports iteye intambwe nziza

Kiyovu Sports itsinze Police FC ibitego 2-0 mu mukino ubanza wa 1/2 cy'igikombe cy'Amahoro waberaga kuri Stade ya Kigali biyongerera amahirwe yo kuba yagera ku mukino wa nyuma uyu mwaka.

Umukino wo kwishyura uzakirwa na Police FC ku Cyumweru.

Tubashimire mwese twabanye kuri uyu mukino, tuzasubire ku wa Gatandatu ku mukino uzahuza Rayon Sports na AS Kigali.

16:53

Umukino urarangiye

16:49

90' Iminota y'inyongera

Umusifuzi wa kane yerekanye iminota ine y'inyongera. Kiyovu Sports ikomeje kuyobora umukino n'ibitego 2-0 ndetse iri gusatira mu buryo bukomeye.

16:48

88' Gusimbuza

Ngarambe Ibrahim asimbuye Shavy Babicka ku ruhande rwa Kiyovu Sports.

16:45

85' Abatoza n'abakinnyi ba Kiyovu bahagurutse

Umutoza Kirasa Alain n'abakinnyi barimo Ndoli Jean Claude bari guha amabwiriza abakinnyi bari mu kibuga kygira ngo batinjizwa igitego.

16:43

Imvura yimuye abafana

Ubwo imvura yagwaga mukanya gato gashize, abafana bari adadatwikiriye, bahise bimuka bajya ahatwikiriye.

16:39

78' Gusimbuza

Nizeyimana Djuma wavunitse, asimbuwe na Nsanzimfura Keddy ku ruhande rwa Kiyovu Sports ikomeje gushaka uburyo ibona igitego cya gatatu.

16:36

75' Igitego cya kabiri cya Kiyovu Sports

Ghislain Armel ateye penaliti ivuyemo igitego cya kabiri cya Kiyovu Sports ku ishoti rikomeye ateye rikorwaho na Bwanakweri Emmanuel, ariko umupira ukomereza mu izamu.

16:34

74' Penaliti

Kiyovu Sports ibonye penaliti ku ikosa Mitima Isaac akoreye kuri rutahizamu wa Kiyovu Sports, Nizeyimana Djuma mu rubuga rw'amahina. Uyu mukinnyi aryamye hasi mu kibuga yitabwaho n'abaganga ndetse asohowe aryamye ku ngobyi.

16:33

70' Gusimbuza

Hakizimana Kevin asimbuwe na Peter Otema ku ruhande rwa Police FC.

16:29

68' Gusimbuza

Iyabivuze Osee asimbuwe na Uwimbabazi Jean Paul ku ruhande rwa Police FC.

16:28

68' Gusatira kwa Kiyovu

Nizeyimana Djuma akinannyena Shavy Babicka uteye umupira mwiza mu rubuga rw'amahina, ba myugariro ba Police FC bawukuraho bahuzagurika. Bwari ubundi buryo bwashoboraga guha Kiyovu Sports ikindi gitego.

16:26

66' Ikarita y'umuhondo

Ahoyikuye Jean Paul 'Mukonya' ahawe ikarita y'umuhondo ku ikosa akoreye ku mukinnyi wa Police FC, Iyabivuze Osee.

16:22

61' Coup-franc ya Kiyovu

Kiyovu Sports ibonye umupira w'umuterekano utewe na Ahoyikuye Jean Paul, umupira uca hejuru y'izamu. Nizeyimana Djuma na we ateye undi mupira ufatwa na Bwanakweri Emmanuel.

16:19

58' Igitego cya Kiyovu Sports

Kiyovu Sports ifunguye amazamu ku gitego gitsinzwe na Habamahoro Vincent ku mupira uvuye kuri coup-franc itewe na Kalisa Rachid. Kiyovu Sports yahize igitego kuva kare ndetse birangiye ibigezeho.

16:14

54' Gusatira kwa Kiyovu Sports

Ghislain Armel na Bonane Janvier bashyize Police FC ku gitutu ariko ba myugariro bayo birwanaho, bakiza izamu.

16:08

49' Police FC ihushije igitego cyabazwe

Songa Isaie ateye umupira ukomeye ukuwemo na Nzeyurwanda Djihad, ugarukira Hakizimana Kevin uteye ishoti rikomeye rica hejuru y'izamu. Ikipe y'abashinzwe umutekano itangiye iri hejuru muri iki gice cya kabiri.

16:05

Igice cya kabiri kiratangiye

Police FC itangije igice cya kabiri. Ndayishimiye Antoine Dominique ateye umupira mu izamu ufatwa na Nzeyurwanda Djihad.

15:47

Igice cya mbere kirarangiye

15:46

44' Kiyovu Sports ntiratwara iri rushanwa kuva ryiswe Igikombe cy'Amahoro

Iyi kipe ifite ibikombe bitatu by’igihugu. Icya nyuma igiheruka mu 1993 ubwo yanatwaraga shampiyona. Ibi bivuze ko itaratwara iri rushanwa kuva ryitiriwe Amahoro mu 1995.

15:44

42' Nzeyurwanda arokoye Kiyovu

Iyabivuze azamukanye umupira mu ruhande rw'ibiryo, awuhindura mu izamu rya Kiyovu Sports, ukurwamo na Nzeyurwanda Djihad uwuteye ibipfunsi.

15:39

38' Ubundi buryo bwa Police FC

Ndayishimiye Antoine Dominique ateye umupira ukomeye mu izamu rya Kiyovu, ufatwa na Nzeyurwanda uhise awusubiza bagenzi be.

15:37

35' Gusatira kwa Police FC

Iyabivuze Osee azamukanye umupira, atera ishoti ryo hasi ari inyuma gato y'urubuga rw'amahina ufatwa neza na Nzeyurwanda Djihad uwutanguranwe na Ndayishimiye Dominique wari uwukurikiye, ariko umusifuzi wo ku ruhade yerekana ko uyu rutahizamu wa police FC yari yarayemo.

15:34

32' Umukino uhagazeho gato

Nizeyimana Djuma ugerageje ishoti rinyuze imbere y'izamu nyuma yo gucenga abakinnyi ba myugariro ba Police FC agize ikibazo, abanza kwitabwaho n'abaganga mbere y'uko akomeza gukina.

15:29

27' Kiyovu Sports yongeye guhusha uburyo bwiza

Shavy Babicka yongeye kuzamukana umupira asiga abakinnyi ba Police FC ahagana mu ruhande ariko ashatse kuwutera mu izamu ujya hanze. Kiyovu Sports ikomeje gusatira mu buryo bukomeye ariko kubona izamu rya Police FC biracyari ikibazo.

15:23

22' Police FC yari ibonye uburyo bugana ku izamu

Ndayishimiye Antoine Dominique ahaye akazu abakinnyi ba Kiyovu Sports ku mupira ahinduye mu rubuga rw'amahina, Rwabuhihi Aime Placide araryama, asubizayo umupira akoresheje umutwe.

15:20

18' Police Fc ikomeje kugorwa n'uyu mukino

Ikipe y'abashinzwe umutekano iheruka kwegukana igikombe cy'Amahoro mu 2015, yagowe n'intangiriro z'uyu mukino ndetse iri kurushwa bikomeye na Kiyovu Sports muri iyi minota.

15:14

12' Bwanakweri arokoye Police FC

Shavy Babicka ateye ishoti rikomeye mu izamu, umunyezamu wa Police FC, Bwanakweri Emmanuel ashyira umupira muri koruneri itewe na Rachid umupira wongere gukurwaho n'umunyezamu.

15:11

9' Kiyovu Sports yongeye gusatira

Kiyovu inyotewe no gutsinda hakiri kare. Ahoyikuye ahinduye undi mupira ukomeye usanga Nizeyimana Djuma mu rubuga rw'amahina, ashyizeho umutwe uca hejuru y'izamu.

15:07

5' Kiyovu ihushije uburyo bwiza

Ahoyikuye Jean Paul azamukanye umupira mu ruhande rw'iburyo, awuhindura mu rubuga rw'amahina, shavy Babicka agiye kuwutera mu izamu arawuhusha, abakinnyi ba Police FC bahita bakiza izamu.

15:02

Umukino uratangiye

Umusifuzi atangije umukino. Police FC itangiye isatira ariko abakinnyi b'inyuma ba Kiyovu Sports barenza umupira.

15:02

Abakinnyi bitabajwe ku mpande zombi

Kiyovu Sports: Nzeyurwanda Djihad, Serumogo Ally, Ahoyukuye Jean Paul, Ngirimana, Rwabuhihi Aime Placide, Kalisa Rachid, Bonane Janvier, Nizeyimana Djuma, Shavy Babicka na Armel Ghislain.

Umutoza: Kirasa Alain

Police FC: Bwanakweri Emmanuel, Ngendahimana Eric, Ishimwe Issa, Ndayishimiye Celestin, Hakizimana Issa, Mitima Isaac, Iyabivuze Osée, Ndayisaba Hamidou, Songa Isaie, Hakizimana Kevin, Ndayishimiye Antoine Dominique.

Umutoza: Nshimiyimana Maurice ‘Maso’


14:59

Amakipe yombi yishyushya

14:58

Gahunda ya 1/2

Ku wa Gatatu

AS Kigali 1-2 Rayon Sports FC

Uyu munsi

SC Kiyovu vs Police FC (Stade de Kigali, 15h00)

Abakinnyi batemerewe gukina imikino ibanza

1. Mpozembizi Mohamed (Police FC)
2. Nsabimana Aimable (Police FC)

Imikino yo kwishyura

Ku wa Gatandatu

Rayon Sports FC vs AS Kigali (Stade de Kigali, 15h00)

Ku Cyumweru

Police FC vs SC Kiyovu (Stade Kicukiro, 15h00)

14:54

Ikaze kuri Stade ya Kigali i Nyamirambo

IGIHE ibahaye ikaze kuri Stade ya Kigali i Nyamirambo hagiye kubera umukino ubanza wa 1/2 cy'igikombe cy'Amahoro hagati ya Kiyovu Sports na Police FC.

Kiyovu Sports yageze muri iki cyiciro imaze gusezerera Intare FC mu gihe Police FC yakuyemo Etincelles FC.

Umukino uratangira mukanya saa 15:00.
